snippet: Defending champion Stan Wawrinka held off a late charge by Spain's Albert Ramos Vinolas to storm into the French Open semi-finals with a 6-2 6-1 7-6(7) victory on Wednesday....
lead_paragraph: Defending champion Stan Wawrinka held off a late charge by Spain's Albert Ramos Vinolas to storm into the French Open semi-finals with a 6-2 6-1 7-6(7) victory on Wednesday.

headline.print_headline: Wawrinka Blasts Past Ramos Vinolas to Reach Last Four
headline.main: Wawrinka Blasts Past Ramos Vinolas to Reach Last Four
